me.Abhigya.core.handler

Class PluginHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.handler.PluginHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionItemHandler, CommandHandler, GameRuleHandler

    public abstract class PluginHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Class for handling Plugin. Also this is an implementation of Listener, so the events in this class can be registered by using register() or unregister by using unregister().

    Also isAllowMultipleInstances() allows the developer to protect its handler from the creation of more than one instance of it. Also isAllowMultipleInstances() or the class extending PluginHandler must be final to prevent overriding.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isAllowMultipleInstances

        protected abstract boolean isAllowMultipleInstances()
        Gets whether this handler allows the creation of more than one instance of it.

        This is useful to avoid users to create instances of this handler.

        Returns:
        true to allow more than one instance
